thread.section_title: Politics - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8
thread.title: Man found guilty of killing his police officer wife
thread.title_full: Man found guilty of killing his police officer wife - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Man found guilty of killing his police officer wife
text:
RIVERSIDE (CBS 8) - The husband of slain Escondido Police Officer Laura Perez was convicted of second-degree murder and arson.
A Riverside County jury found Freddy Perez-Rodas guilty of gunning down his wife and then torching their Murrieta home to cover up the crime.
The couple's five-year-old daughter is now being cared for by Laura's mother.
Perez-Rodas faces 49-years to life in prison when he is sentenced on December 4th.
